description:
<p>An exciting opportunity has arisen for a Band 4 Registered Nursing Associate to join our busy and dynamic Outpatients team at Kidderminster Treatment Centre. It is imperative that you have undertaken the Foundation Degree Nursing Associate course. .</p>
<p>We cover a wide range of specialities and always strive to provide our patients with the highest standard of care. The successful candidate will be an enthusiastic and hard working individual with a friendly and approachable nature.</p>
title: Registered Nursing Associate
